--- alter_database.sql
ALTER DATABASE dbname SET OPTIONS (
    optimizer_version=2,
    optimizer_statistics_package='auto_20191128_14_47_22UTC',
    version_retention_period='7d',
    enable_key_visualizer=true,
    default_leader='europe-west1'
  )
--- AST
&ast.AlterDatabase{
  Name: &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 15,
    NameEnd: 21,
    Name: "dbname",
  },
  Options: &ast.Options{
    Options: 26,
    Rparen: 226,
    Records: []*ast.OptionsDef{
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 40,
          NameEnd: 57,
          Name: "optimizer_version",
        },
        Value: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 58,
          ValueEnd: 59,
          Base: 10,
          Value: "2",
        },
      },
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 65,
          NameEnd: 93,
          Name: "optimizer_statistics_package",
        },
        Value: &ast.StringLiteral{
          ValuePos: 94,
          ValueEnd: 121,
          Value: "auto_20191128_14_47_22UTC",
        },
      },
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 127,
          NameEnd: 151,
          Name: "version_retention_period",
        },
        Value: &ast.StringLiteral{
          ValuePos: 152,
          ValueEnd: 156,
          Value: "7d",
        },
      },
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 162,
          NameEnd: 183,
          Name: "enable_key_visualizer",
        },
        Value: &ast.BoolLiteral{
          ValuePos: 184,
          Value: true,
        },
      },
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 194,
          NameEnd: 208,
          Name: "default_leader",
        },
        Value: &ast.StringLiteral{
          ValuePos: 209,
          ValueEnd: 223,
          Value: "europe-west1",
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER DATABASE dbname SET OPTIONS (optimizer_version = 2, optimizer_statistics_package = "auto_20191128_14_47_22UTC", version_retention_period = "7d", enable_key_visualizer = true, default_leader = "europe-west1")
